TopicTitle: What are you jamming to up in space?

Articles.Content:
I've definitely gotten tired of the stock KSP ost, and tried out some different soundtracks. So far, i've really liked From the Depth's & Surviving Mars's OST, but what works absolutely the best is Hardspace: Shipbreaker's OST. The twangy, americana/synth music just works very well while flying huge interplanetary ships.

Let's add to the pool! What are you listening to?

This may not be KSP related (But I dont feel like making an entirely new thread would be usefull)

When I play War Thunder I listen to whatever Youtube gives me (Lynyrd Skynyrd, Black Sabbath, Metallica, Guns 'n' roses). Cool I guess.
Various works from Delia Derbyshire and the Radiophonic Workshop
